DOC.brief_summary: Investigator-initiated prospective randomized multicentre study to uncover the true burden of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation in a representative population of acute stroke patients without known atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Standardized MONitoring for Detection of Atrial Fibrillation in Ischemic Stroke
